remarks: Restricting a function to a domain without one element of the domain of the function, and adding a pair of this element and the function value of the element results in the function itself.  (Contributed by AV, 2-Dec-2018.)
statement: funresdfunsn $p |- ( ( Fun F /\ X e. dom F ) -> ( ( F |` ( _V \ { X } ) ) u. { <. X , ( F ` X ) >. } ) = F ) $.
